com.ssdd.util.logging.centralized.service

Class CentralizedLogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.util.logging.centralized.service.CentralizedLogService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CentralizedLogServiceProxy

    @Singleton
 @Path(value="/log")
public class CentralizedLogService
extends java.lang.Object
    Centralized logging service to deploy in Apache Tomcat 7.0.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

      private java.io.FileWriter file
      File to write the logging content.
      private boolean isFileWritable
      flag to indicate if the write is permitted in current service.

      • buildProxy

        public static CentralizedLogService buildProxy(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a proxy to access an instance of this service in remote.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        CentralizedLogServerProxy to serve as proxy for the /log service, served in the given host

      • buildServiceUri

        public static java.lang.String buildServiceUri(java.lang.String host)
        factory method, to build a URI for a CentralizedLogService from the host IP and PORT.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP adress and PORT of server in which the service is allocated.
        Returns:
        String containing the URI to the service, served in the given host

 @Path(value="/status")

        @GET
 @Path(value="/available")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")

      • log

        @GET
 @Path(value="/write")
public void log(@QueryParam(value="line")
                                              java.lang.String line)
        writes the received line in the file, and then flushes it to ensure that line is persisted in file.
        Parameters:
        line - the line to write in the service's log file
